snippet: President Hugo Chávez, battling cancer as he runs for re-election, has not declared an heir apparent, raising speculation about who could take his place.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez has yet to name an heir apparent, even though he is battling cancer as he runs for re-election, which has raised speculation about who could take his place should his failing health force him from office.
lead_paragraph: President Hugo Chávez, battling cancer as he runs for re-election, has not declared an heir apparent, raising speculation about who could take his place.

headline.seo: Hugo Chávez Forces Venezuelans to Contemplate a Void
headline.main: Chávez Forces Venezuela to Contemplate a Void
headline.print_headline: Chávez Forces Venezuela To Contemplate a Void
